CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The device fabricated using PFD2TBT_10Per showed the highest PCE ( 1.51% ) among the PFD2TBT - based polymers.

Let's think step by step.

Material Name
------------

* PFD2TBT_10Per
* PFD2TBT - based polymers

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Material Name
------------

* PFD2TBT_10Per
* PFD2TBT - based polymers

Note: I have kept "PFD2TBT - based polymers" as a valid entity, as it refers to a class of materials based on PFD2TBT.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The device fabricated using PFD2TBT_10Per showed the highest PCE ( 1.51% ) among the PFD2TBT - based polymers.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PFD2TBT\_10Per |
| PCE |

The two "Property Name" entities in the paragraph are "PFD2TBT\_10Per" and "PCE". "PFD2TBT\_10Per" is a type of polymer used in the device fabrication, and "PCE" stands for power conversion efficiency, which is a measure of the efficiency of a solar cell.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PCE |

After reviewing the paragraph, the only clear "Material Property" entity is "PCE", which stands for power conversion efficiency. "PFD2TBT\_10Per" is not a material property, but rather a type of polymer used in the device fabrication. Therefore, it is not included in the table.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The device fabricated using PFD2TBT_10Per showed the highest PCE ( 1.51% ) among the PFD2TBT - based polymers.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| PFD2TBT_10Per |
| 1.51% |
| PFD2TBT - based polymers |

These are the identified "Property Value" entities from the given paragraph. The first one is "PFD2TBT_10Per", which is a property value related to the device fabrication. The second one is "1.51%", which is the power conversion efficiency (PCE) value. The last one is "PFD2TBT - based polymers", which refers to the class of polymers used in the fabrication process.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| 1.51% |

After reevaluating the original paragraph, only "1.51%" is a clear value of a material property, which is the power conversion efficiency (PCE). The other entities, "PFD2TBT_10Per" and "PFD2TBT - based polymers", are related to the material but do not represent specific values of material properties.
